definition: to press/to push/to leave aside or shelve/to control/to restrain/to keep one's hand on/to check or refer to/according to/in the light of/(of an editor or author) to make a comment
see 壓根兒|压根儿[ya4 gen1 r5]
to press/to push down/to keep under (control)/pressure

sentences.english: To assess the effectiveness of cardiac compressions during adult cardiopulmonary resuscitation, the nurse should palpate which pulse site?
sentences.chinese: 心肺复苏时，评估按压的有效性，应检查哪处的脉搏？

sentences.english: The stomach cancer patient epigastrium ache, through will hold back will also have the alleviation.
sentences.chinese: 胃癌患者上腹部疼痛，通过按压也会有所缓解。

sentences.english: In addition, some insurance companies begin to accept acupressure.
sentences.chinese: 另外，部分保险公司也逐渐接受穴位按压。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a press type gear shift rod head with a lockset.
sentences.chinese: 一种具有锁具的按压式排档杆头。

sentences.english: Attention should be moderate, preferably by light gradually heavy.
sentences.chinese: 注意按压要适度，最好由轻渐重。

sentences.english: For left-clicking, you press the whole track pad with one finger.
sentences.chinese: 如果要点击左键，你需要用一个手指按压整个触控板。

sentences.english: Avoid rubbing or pressing on your eye.
sentences.chinese: 请不要因此而揉搓或按压您的眼睛。

sentences.english: It did, more or less - the rescuers averaged 113 beats per minute.
sentences.chinese: 结果是或多或少，救援人员平均每分钟按压113下。

sentences.english: The viewfinder image will darken when the previewAE lock button is pressed.
sentences.chinese: 当按压预景深自动曝光锁定按钮时，取景器相将变暗。

sentences.english: Doctor Sayre suggests that medical workers do both the breathing method and chest compressions.
sentences.chinese: 塞尔医生建议，医务工作者做呼吸法和胸外按压。

sentences.english: N. If you hit the carotid artery , pull the needle out and hold pressure for 5 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 如果误刺到颈动脉，拨出穿刺针并按压5分钟。

sentences.english: Push down the middle and then move out.
sentences.chinese: 在纸张中间按一下，然后沿整个边缘按压。

sentences.english: Methods To put correct and effective compression on the patients with femoral artery puncture.
sentences.chinese: 方法对股动脉穿刺采血患者实行正确有效的按压。

sentences.english: Press the weatherstrip to seat into the front lower glass run channel.
sentences.chinese: 按压防水饰条使之定位于前下玻璃移动沟槽中。

sentences.english: Traditional Chinese massage is different from Shiatsu . People who practice Shiatsu just press your acupoints.
sentences.chinese: 推拿和指压不太一样，指压师只会按压你的穴道。

definition: to paint/to smear/to apply (makeup etc)/to doodle/to erase/to obliterate
to pat/to slap/(of a bird) to flap (one's wings)
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
